description: The iPhone 17 (256GB) model price in India starts at Rs. 82,900, while the iPhone Air (256GB) price starts at Rs. 119,900. The iPhone 17 Pro (256GB) starts at Rs. 134,900 while the 17 Pro Max (256GB) starts at Rs. 149,900. In India, the new iPhones will go on pre-order starting September 12 and will be available beginning September 19.
title: iPhone 17 Price in India Revealed: Full Price List for New iPhones, Watches and AirPods Pro 3

description: During the much-awaited “Awe Dropping” event on Tuesday, Apple introduced the new iPhone 17 Pro models. Just like the previous year, these include two models, the iPhone 17 Pro and the iPhone 17 Pro Max. Both smartphones were introduced by Apple CEO Tim Cook during the pre-recorded event. These devices succeed the iPhone 16 Pro and the iPhone 16 Pro Max.
title: iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max Are Here: Massive Camera Upgrades, and A19 Pro Chip

description: Apple’s AirPods Pro 3, priced at $249 (about Rs. 22,000), will go on sale from September 19 in white, with pre-orders now open. The earbuds feature health sensors for heart rate tracking, adaptive ANC with transparency mode, and live translation via Apple Intelligence. They sport a new ergonomic design with five ear tip sizes, IP57 dust and water resistance, and a smaller case with a visible status light. Battery life is claimed to be up to eight hours per charge.
title: AirPods Pro 3 Launched: Featuring Lossless Audio and a Redesigned Case

description: Apple Watch Series 11 has debuted globally, alongside the Watch Ultra 3 and Watch SE (3rd Generation), on Tuesday. The US-based tech giant unveiled its latest smartwatches during the ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event. Apart from the Watch Series 11 and Watch Ultra 3, the company also launched the iPhone 17 series, which includes the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, and iPhone 17 Pro Max.
title: Apple Watch Series 11, Ultra 3, and SE Launched: Thinner Design and New Health Sensors

description: iPhone 17 has been launched at Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event. The latest handset from the Cupertino-based tech giant is the base model in the new iPhone lineup and comes with an A19 chipset, improved cameras, and other quality-of-life upgrades over the preceding model. It is also equipped with support for Apple Intelligence — the company's proprietary artificial intelligence (AI) suite.
title: iPhone 17 Launched: A19 Chip, Apple Intelligence, and More

description: At its "Awe Dropping" event in California on Wednesday, Apple finally took the wraps off the new iPhone Air. It arrives as an all-new model in the company’s lineup and replaces 2024’s iPhone 16 Plus. The iPhone Air comes with the same chip as the standard iPhone 17, along with support for Apple Intelligence. The handset competes against the Galaxy S25 Edge in the ultra-slim smartphone space.
title: iPhone Air Launched: Ultra-Slim Form Factor, Apple Intelligence Features, and More

description: Global premium smartphone sales grew eight percent YoY in H1 2025, according to Counterpoint Research. Apple retained its top position with a 62 percent market share, followed by Samsung, Huawei and Xiaomi. Google climbed to the fifth spot this time, thanks to strong Pixel 9 sales, which doubled YoY.
title: Global Premium Smartphone Sales Hit Record High in H1 2025 as Google Re-Enters Top Five: Counterpoint

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra is widely anticipated to be the successor to the Galaxy S25 Ultra, which was launched earlier this year. Following a similar launch timeline, the Galaxy S26 Ultra might debut in January 2026, as part of the Galaxy S26 series. Months before its launch, a tipster has revealed a few details regarding the thickness of the rumoured flagship handset’s rear camera module.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Ultra Tipped to Feature Thicker Rear Camera Module Comprising 50-Megapixel Telephoto Camera

description: Tecno unveiled the Tecno Spark Slim smartphone at the IFA (Internationale FunkAusstellung) Berlin tech show last week. Though the company initially withheld the phone's full specifications, now it has listed the handset on its website, revealing its design, specifications, colour options, and RAM and storage details.
title: Tecno Spark Slim Full Specifications Revealed; Features MediaTek Helio G200 SoC, 5.93mm Thick Build

description: Apple's Powerbeats Fit TWS earbuds, tipped to launch in Fall 2025, will likely debut in four colourways. Designed as workout-focused earbuds with secure wingtips, they reportedly feature four ear tip sizes, Apple’s H1 chip, ANC with transparency mode, Adaptive EQ, and personalised spatial audio. Playback is expected to reach seven hours per charge or up to 30 hours with the case. Each earbud may include IPX4 splash resistance, according to leaked details.
title: Apple Powerbeats Fit Colour Options, Key Features Leaked; May Offer Up to 30 Hours Total Battery Life

description: Baaghi 4, starring Tiger Shroff and Sanjay Dutt, was released in theatres on September 5, 2025. According to reports, Baaghi 4 will stream on Amazon Prime Video during early November, but the date is yet to be finalised; that's why it has not been revealed.
title: Baaghi 4 OTT Release: When Could Tiger Shroff-Starring Action Thriller Be Available for Streaming?

description: Bakasura Restaurant is a Telugu horror comedy, where a lemon enters the restaurant and changes everything. Directed and written by Sj Shiva, the lead cast of Baksura Restaurant comprises Janardhan Achari, Lakshmaiah Achari, Amar, Krishna Bhagvaan, Vivek Dandu and more. Baksura Restaurant will premiere on Sun NXT on September 12.
title: Bakasura Restaurant OTT Release Date Announced: Know When, Where to Watch Telugu-Language Horror-Comedy Film Online

description: Bybit has reopened its app for Indian users after completing registration with the Financial Intelligence Unit-India (FIU-IND). Website access will be restored in phases over the next few days. The exchange had paused operations in January 2025 due to regulatory changes, but now resumes trading under India’s Prevention of Money Laundering Act (PMLA), reflecting the evolving regulatory landscape for cryptocurrency platforms in the country.
title: Bybit Resumes Full Operations in India After Regulatory Approval

description: Google on Monday announced a set of new artificial intelligence (AI) features for its learning platform, NotebookLM. The update introduces two additions — Flashcards and Quiz — designed to let users test their understanding of source material through interactive assessments. Reports and Learning Guides are also being redesigned with new customisation options, while the company has entered a fresh partnership to enhance the platform’s capabilities.
title: Google NotebookLM Upgraded With Flashcards, Quizzes and a Redesigned Reports

description: Hollow Knight: Silksong is a massive hit on all platforms. The hotly anticipated indie title has reportedly crossed five million players across all supported platforms. The game has also sold over three million copies on Steam alone in just three days. According to market research data, Silksong has generated $50 million in revenue on Steam so far.
title: Hollow Knight: Silksong Has Reportedly Crossed 5 Million Players in 3 Days

description: Apple is set to host its ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event today. The event is expected to see the launch of the iPhone 17 series, which could include the standard iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone 17 Air. The battery capacities of some of the iPhone models had recently leaked online. Now, hours ahead of their anticipated unveiling, the battery capacities of the standard iPhone 17 had surfaced as well.
title: iPhone 17 Battery Capacity Leaked Shortly Before Apple's ‘Awe Dropping’ Launch Event

description: JioSaavn Pro subscription price in India has dropped for a limited time period, as its parent company is celebrating Jio’s ninth anniversary. This comes weeks after the company announced that it is offering the JioSaavn Pro subscription to all its prepaid and postpaid subscribers, an option which ended on August 31. However, the music streaming service has not announced when the new offer expires.
title: JioSaavn Pro Plan Price in India Temporarily Slashed to Rs. 9 for First Two Months

description: Madharasi is a Tamil-language thriller film, written and directed by A.R. Murugadoss. The movie is packed with action and follows a deadly mission to infiltrate an illegal arms syndicate. After it completes its theatrical run, Madharaasi is reported to be available after four weeks, only on Amazon Prime Video.
title: Madharaasi OTT Release Details: Know All About This Sivakarthikeyan-Starrer Film

description: Materialists is a romantic drama all set to premiere on OTT platforms. The film stars Chris Evans, Pedro Pascal, and Dakota Johnson in the lead roles. This Celine Song directorial explore love, drama, ambition and wealth in New York City. The core of this drama is Lucy Mason. Earlier, the film was available on a rental basis on Amazon Prime Video. However, Materialists will soon be available on OTT.
title: Materialists OTT Release: When, Where to Watch Chris Evans, Dakota Johnson, and Pedro Pascal-Starrer Online

description: The first study to utilise microscopic damage on sauropod dinosaur teeth, a method known as Dental Microwear Texture Analysis (DMTA), has shed light on the feeding habits and locomotion of herbivores 150 million years ago, according to new findings reported on September 7, 2025, by Freie Universität Berlin.
title: Microscopic Tooth Scratches Unlock Secrets of Sauropod Dinosaurs

description: Oppo has launched the A6 Pro in China with 7a ,000mAh battery with 80W fast charging. It runs on the MediaTek Dimensity 7300 chip and offers up to 16GB of RAM. It has a dual rear camera unit led by a 50-megapixel main sensor. The Oppo A6 Pro has an IP66, IP68, and IP69 rating.
title: Oppo A6 Pro With 7,000mAh Battery, Dimensity 7300 SoC Launched: Price, Specifications

description: Samsung is reportedly planning three foldables for 2026, including one Flip and two Folds, which may feature a “Wide Fold” with an almost square 18:18 aspect ratio. This model is seen as a response to Apple’s rumoured square iPhone Fold. The new Fold model is expected to launch alongside the Galaxy Z Fold 8 and Flip 8 in late 2026. Meanwhile, Samsung’s tri-fold phone, debuting this November, could join its regular lineup depending on market reception.
title: Samsung Reportedly Plans Two Galaxy Z Fold Models for 2026, Including One With Square Display

description: The goal of SpaceX's Starlink project is to transmit broadband internet from orbit. With the most recent launch, the network now has 28 satellites, connecting far-flung areas across the globe. About an hour after liftoff, these satellites effortlessly inserted themselves into their orbits after separating from the rocket's second stage.
title: SpaceX Expands Starlink Network, Celebrates 500th Rocket Recovery

description: Astronomers once thought the universe’s first stars were only massive giants. New simulations and lab experiments reveal turbulence and early chemistry allowed smaller, Sun-like stars to form too. This discovery reshapes our view of cosmic dawn, showing the first stellar generation was more diverse than previously believed.
title: Universe’s First Stars May Have Been Smaller Than Astronomers Once Believed

description: Apple is all set to host its annual hardware launch event today, where the iPhone 17 series is expected to be unveiled. These devices will come pre-installed with iOS 26, the company’s latest OS update. Apart from this, the Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and AirPods Pro (3rd Generation) are also said to be on the cards. Here’s all you need to know.
title: Apple Event 2025: iPhone 17 Launch Date and Time, Live Updates and Everything You Need to Know

description: iQOO 15 and iQOO Neo 11 series are said to be in the works. While we wait for the formal launch, a new leak suggests their key specifications. The iQOO 15 and iQOO Neo 11 are said to run on the Snapdragon chipsets. The iQOO Neo 11 Pro is tipped to be powered by a MediaTek Dimensity 9500 chipset. All three models are said to come with a 7,000mAh battery with 100W charging support.
title: iQOO 15, iQOO Neo 11 Series Specifications Leaked; Said to Get 7,000mAh Battery, 100W Charging Support

description: Hollywood star Keanu Reeves has said he'd "love" to return as Johnny Silverhand in Cyberpunk 2. The sequel to Cyberpunk 2077 is currently in pre-production at CD Projekt Red. Reeves appeared as Silverhand in the first game and its Phantom Liberty expansion.
title: Keanu Reeves Says He'd Love to Return as Johnny Silverhand in Cyberpunk 2

description: Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ launch event is set to take place on Tuesday, September 9. The Cupertino company is expected to unveil the iPhone 17, iPhone 17 Pro, iPhone 17 Pro Max, and iPhone 17 Air during the event. However, the smartphones are not going to be the only devices debuting on Tuesday. The tech giant is also said to unveil its latest smartwatches, dubbed Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, and Watch SE 3, alongside the AirPods Pro (3rd Generation).
title: AirPods Pro (3rd Generation) Specifications Leaked Hours Before Apple's ‘Awe Dropping’ Launch Event

description: After months of downplaying concerns, Google has acknowledged that the “open web is already in a rapid decline.” The admission came during an ongoing remedial trial that could decide whether the company must divest part of its advertising business. Notably, just last month, Google dismissed third-party reports pointing to falling search traffic, arguing that the studies relied on “flawed methodologies.”
title: Google Backtracks on Previous Traffic Claims, Says “Open Web Is Already in Rapid Decline”

description: Google introduced a new feature called Daily Hub with the Pixel 10 series last month. It is inspired by Samsung’s Now Brief, providing collated information about the user’s activities in the Discover feed. However, the tech giant is now reported to be pulling this feature for a brief period, in order to deliver a more refined experience.
title: Google Reportedly Pulls Daily Hub Feature on Pixel 10 Series to ‘Improve Experience’

description: NPCI has increased UPI transaction limits, allowing users to make high-value payments from their phones. The changes will come into effect soon. People will be able to make payments in various categories, like capital markets, insurance, government e-marketplace, travel, and credit card repayments. Now users will be able to send up to Rs. 10,00,000 in 24 hours.
title: NPCI to Increase UPI Per Day, Per Transaction Transfer Limits From September 15

description: Amazon’s Great Indian Festival and Flipkart’s Big Billion Days Sale will begin on September 23, offering discounts on personal gadgets and other electronics. Ahead of the sales, Xiaomi’s Sandeep Sarma advised customers to buy only from authorised sellers to ensure genuine products and valid after-sales support. On Amazon, authorised Xiaomi sellers include Darshita Mobiles, Green Mobiles, Clicktech Retail, and Dawntech Electronics, while Flipkart buyers can purchase smartphones via Mythanglory and Akshnav, and accessories through Treasure EVERretailer, RetailNet, OmniTechRetail, and MTAILMODEECOM.
title: Xiaomi Confirms Authorised Retailers Ahead of Amazon Great Indian Festival and Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale

description: Apple launched the MacBook Air M4 in India in March 2025 with 13-inch and 15-inch Liquid Retina displays, up to 32GB RAM, and 2TB storage, starting at Rs. 99,900. The 13-inch model with 16GB RAM and 256GB storage is now listed at Rs. 83,990 on Amazon, while the 15-inch variant with a 10-core GPU is priced at Rs. 1,09,990, both nearly Rs. 16,000 lower than launch prices. Available in Midnight, Silver, Sky Blue, and Starlight, the laptops also come with additional bank and exchange offers.
title: Apple MacBook Air M4 Available With Up to Rs 16,000 Discount via Amazon: Check Price, Availability

description: Crypto markets remained steady on Tuesday, with Bitcoin trading near $112,000 (roughly Rs. 98.7 lakh) and Ethereum at $4,313 (roughly Rs. 3.8 lakh). While BTC showed strength in ETF inflows, Ethereum faced pressure from outflows. Altcoins, including Dogecoin and Solana, displayed notable gains. Analysts pointed to inflation data and Fed policy as the key near-term triggers, with traders watching if Bitcoin can break past $113,000 or risk slipping below $110,400.
title: Bitcoin Climbs to $112,000 as Altcoins Pick up Steam

description: Flipkart’s Big Billion Days sale, kicking off on September 23, could be the ideal moment to buy the Pixel 9 smartphone. Google is confirmed to offer the standard Pixel 9 model at less than 50 percent of its original price, making it a great deal for anyone looking for a compact Android phone.
title: Flipkart Big Billion Days Sale 2025: Google Pixel 9 to Go on Sale for Less Than Half of Its Original Price

description: On Monday, Google expanded the file uploading capability of the Gemini app and added support for new file formats. Two prominent formats which are now supported include audio files and ZIP files. Those on the free tier of Gemini can upload a maximum of 10 minutes of audio, and an uploaded ZIP folder can only contain up to 10 files.
title: Google Updates Gemini App With Audio File Uploading Capability, Announced Rate Limits

description: Google on Tuesday announced a major update to its Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast video generation models. The upgrade brings support for 1080p output, introduces a vertical video format popular on platforms like Reels, Shorts, and TikTok, and reduces API pricing for developers. With these changes, the company aims to improve video quality and make the models more accessible for users and app creators alike.
title: Google’s Veo 3 and Veo 3 Fast Updated With Higher Resolution and Vertical Video Format

description: Indian Jones and the Great Circle developer MachineGames has said it hopes to return to the Wolfenstein series to complete the planned trilogy. The studio head said in a recent interview that the developer was not done yet with the series.
title: MachineGames Says Its 'Not Done With Wolfenstein Yet', Has Story for Third Main Game

description: OnePlus 15 camera specifications have surfaced online again. A tipster has shared that the handset could feature a 50-megapixel periscope camera on the back. The leaker has also shared a few other specifications related to the camera lens. Earlier leaks suggest that the rumoured OnePlus 15 will feature a triple rear camera setup. The latest leak comes days after the company's co-founder announced that the next OnePlus flagship handset will be equipped with the DigitalMax Engine, a self-developed imaging technology.
title: OnePlus 15 Camera Specifications Tipped Again Ahead of Anticipated Debut

description: The Sony Xperia 10 VII is said to be in development as the successor to the Xperia 10 VI. Ahead of its anticipated debut, the handset’s renders and specifications have surfaced. It is reported to be powered by a Snapdragon 6 Gen 3 chipset, coupled with 8GB of RAM and 128GB of onboard storage. Renders reveal a redesigned camera island, with a horizontally-placed bar.
title: Sony Xperia 10 VII to Renders and Specifications Reportedly Leak Ahead of Launch

description: The Vivo X300 Pro will feature a 6.78-inch flat display with slim, uniform bezels, moving away from the X200 Pro’s quad-curved design. Both the X300 and X300 Pro will measure 7mm at their thinnest points, slimmer than their predecessors. The series will introduce a redesigned camera module and include 50-megapixel Zeiss-backed wide-angle selfie cameras with autofocus. The X300 will offer a 200-megapixel Zeiss main camera and 50-megapixel Zeiss APO periscope lens, while the X300 Pro will add a 200-megapixel Zeiss periscope and 50-megapixel Sony LYT-828 primary sensor.
title: Vivo X300 Pro Display Size Revealed; Design Partially Teased

description: On Monday, Google announced a new feature for AI Mode in Search, which will allow it to respond to users in multiple new languages. The artificial intelligence (AI)-powered search experience now supports five more languages, including Brazilian Portuguese, Hindi, Indonesian, Japanese, and Korean. It can take a few days before the feature has rolled out to all users globally.
title: Google's AI Mode Adds Support for Hindi and Four Other Languages

description: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro is expected to be officially announced early next year, alongside the Galaxy S26 and Galaxy S26 Ultra models. However, several leaks over the past few months have offered clues about its possible features. Most recently, renders of the flagship smartphone have surfaced online, comparing its design elements to those of the unannounced Galaxy S26 Edge and Xiaomi 16 Pro.
title: Samsung Galaxy S26 Pro, Galaxy S26 Edge, Xiaomi 16 Pro Renders Showcasing Bezel Differences Leaked

description: Apple’s upcoming ‘Awe Dropping’ event is set to unveil its next-gen hardware, including the iPhone 17 series, AirPods Pro 3, and three new Apple Watch models. The iPhone 17 Air, Apple’s thinnest phone yet, is expected to debut alongside updates on iOS 26 and macOS Tahoe. The company will stream the event live via its website and YouTube channel, and you can stay tuned for Apple September 2025 Event LIVE News Updates on Gadgets 360.
title: Apple Event 2025 LIVE: iPhone 17 Series, Apple Watch Ultra 3, AirPods Pro 3 Launch Expected

description: Intel revealed major leadership changes on Monday, including the exit of products chief Michelle Johnston Holthaus. Her departure comes as CEO Lip-Bu Tan intensifies efforts to revive the struggling chipmaker. Holthaus, spent over 30 years at Intel and briefly served as interim co-CEO after Pat Gelsinger’s exit, and will continue as a strategic adviser at Intel for the next few months.
title: Intel Announces Key Executive Shake-Up, Says Products Chief Holthaus Will Exit

description: PVR INOX is offering movie tickets at substantially discounted rates today (September 9). This offer is part of its ‘Blockbuster Tuesdays’ scheme, which was first announced in April 2025, and is applicable at more than 300 cinemas across India. It is available for films across different genres and formats, including IMAX, 3D, 4DX, ScreenX, and more. In addition to discounted movie tickets, customers can also take advantage of deals on food and beverages at PVR INOX.
title: PVR INOX Blockbuster Tuesdays Offer: Get Movie Tickets at Rs. 99 Across Cinemas in India

description: Apple’s long-awaited iPhone 17 launch event finally takes place today. It is expected to conclude a year of speculation. A major focus of the event is expected to be on the iPhone 17 series, which is rumoured to include a new model dubbed iPhone 17 Air. Significant upgrades are anticipated across the entire series. Here is the last-minute rumour recap ahead of Apple’s ‘Awe Dropping’ event.
title: What to Expect at Today's Apple Event: Final iPhone 17 Leaks, New Watches, and More

description: Apple’s iPhone 17 launch event is set to take place today at 10:30pm IST. The 'Awe Dropping' event is anticipated to introduce the next-generation iPhone models, ubiquitously known as the iPhone 17 lineup. Other products, such as the Apple Watch Series 11, Watch Ultra 3, Watch SE 3, and AirPods Pro (3rd Generation) are also in line for debut. Here’s how you can watch the Apple's ‘Awe Dropping’ iPhone 17 launch event live.
title: Apple iPhone 17 'Awe Dropping' Event Today: How to Watch Livestream, What to Expect
